channel.title: Instrument Makers Meetup every Friday @ Fablab Berlin
channel.description:
Hi,
there is a meetup of the Musical Instrument Makers group every Friday at the Fablab Berlin. Me and a couple of other Berlin Axoloti Users will join there in the Future.
It is a really nice place with a lot of interesting tools like 3d printers, cutting machines etc. Feel free to join us there :slight_smile:
This is the FB page of the Musical Instrument Makers Group Berlin https://www.facebook.com/groups/musicalinstrumentmakers/?fref=ts
And I also created an Axoloti User Group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/1790298424593145/?fref=ts

item.title: Instrument Makers Meetup every Friday @ Fablab Berlin
item.dc:creator: @Blindsmyth Simon
item.description:
@Blindsmyth wrote:

He @Hugo,

sorry I have been bit busy the last weeks and couldn't acutally make it to the meetup, but I will try to be there this Friday again. Maybe you both wanna to join this week? It is a really good place to meet (sound) geeks from lots of different fields

Read full topic
item.source: Instrument Makers Meetup every Friday @ Fablab Berlin

item.title: Instrument Makers Meetup every Friday @ Fablab Berlin
item.dc:creator: @Hugo
item.description:
@Hugo wrote:

Hey @Blindsmyth. What is the Status here. A friend of mine wants to use axoloti as a guitar effect. I am Not so experienced in guitars nor effect chaining. Would this be the place to meet you and others and get some Inspiration?

Read full topic
